div.p: Types of secondary malignant neoplastic disease, coded in SNOMED CT. Use a code from the disorder hierarchy under secondary malignant neoplastic disease (SNOMED CT 128462008).
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 128462008

publisher.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health

description.value: Types of secondary malignant neoplastic disease, coded in SNOMED CT. Use a code from the disorder hierarchy under secondary malignant neoplastic disease (SNOMED CT 128462008).
